price: 51. And if you could but see, when they will be terrified with no escape (for them), and they will be seized from a near place.
arabic: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: walaw tarā idh faziʿū falā fawta wa-ukhidhū min makānin qarībin
